GSD.description:
virtio_console: Assure used length from device is limited

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.13.4 by commit 21a06a244d2576f93cbc9ce9bf95814c2810c36a. For more details please see the references link.
